name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 6
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 6 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 6 is designed for adults and for kids.
